metadata.title: CVE-2024-37408 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: fprintd through 1.94.3 lacks a security attention mechanism, and thusunexpected actions might be authorized by "auth sufficient pam_fprintd.so"for Sudo.

criterions.comment: fprintd package in mantic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-06-17').
